category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ISSUE_preview_tooltip_properties_after_fix
preference.preference_description: Specifies the properties to be displayed in the tool tip for an image preview displayed in the Issue Preview view of Issue Manager. Valid Values: string - Accepts one or more strings as values; each string must be a property name of the issue report revision object.
